content.rendered:
Directed by Sandy Johnson. Matt Carter.

Written by Tony Jordan. Tony Jordan. Robert Thorogood. Amy Guyler.

Cast Zahra Ahmadi (DS Esther Williams). Dylan Llewellyn (PC Kelby Hartford). Sally Bretton (Martha Lloyd). Felicity Montagu (Margo Martins). Jamie Bamber (Archie Hughes). Barbara Flynn (Anne Lloyd). Jade Harrison (CS Charlie Woods). Montserrat Lombard (Gwen Tyler). Ella Kenion (Dorothy Trowman). Chris Jenks (Josh Woods). Rufus Jones (Terrence Witham). Pooky Quesnel (Louise Fitzallan). Jade Willis (Fireman). Annette Badland (Isla Jay). Dan Ball (Christopher Bromley). Taylor Uttley (Aaron Cole). Phil Daniels (Marvelous Harris). Samantha Spiro (Yvonne Wiley). Yasmin/Epe Akram (Carol Meadows). John Macneill (Adam Avery). Ruth Madoc (Rosie Colbert). Eva Feiler (Nurse Lucy). Davood Ghadami (Ben Tyler). Edward Rowe (Matthew Colbert). Jaye Jacobs (Laura Colbert). Nina Singh (Sarah Dodds). Peter De Jersey (Patrick Wiley). Joe Bone (Gavin Dixon). Dan Mersh (Peter Meadows). David Reed (Sam). Ingrid Oliver (Cassie Parker). Hannah Traylen (Hayley Collins). John Hollingworth (Andrew Parker). Stacey Guthrie (Neighbour). Sarah Corbridge (Cafe guest (uncredited)). Isobel Hamilton (Local (uncredited)). Jon Ian Dredge (Local (uncredited)). Kate Entwistle (Protester (uncredited))

Language English.

Producers Mike O’Regan. Tommy Bulfin. Belinda Campbell. Alexandra Carruthers. Lindsay Hughes. Alex Jones. Tony Jordan. Tim Key. Kris Marshall. Stephen Nye. Diederick Santer.

Production BritBox. British Broadcasting Corporation (BBC). Red Planet Pictures.

Creators Tony Jordan. Robert Thorogood.

No. of Seasons 1

No. of Episodes 6

Status On Going (2023–)
